12_Questions.Sen ne okursun?: What do you read? (literally "you what read")

12_Questions.Ben gazeteyi okurum: I read the newspaper. (literally "I the newspaper read")

43_ki.Hastanedeki çocuklar: the children at the hospital ("the children who are at the hospital")
